definition: Cancer (star sign)
very large/huge/tremendous/gigantic
variant of 蟹[xie4]
crab
Cancer (constellation and sign of the zodiac)

sentences.english: Then, from Tuesday afternoon through Thursday, the stars send intense and beautiful energy your way.
sentences.chinese: 从周二下午到周四，巨蟹宫将会释放强劲的能量。

sentences.english: The area that Miaka pointed to was the region where the constellations of Cancer and Gemini shone.
sentences.chinese: 美朱指着的那片天空正是双子星座和巨蟹星座。

sentences.english: Cancer's possessiveness will actually make Scorpio feel secure.
sentences.chinese: 而巨蟹的占有欲会使天蝎感觉安全。

sentences.english: However, in the eyes of isomerism, it is the sincerity of cancer that attracts them most.
sentences.chinese: 而在异性眼中，巨蟹的真诚最吸引人。

sentences.english: As I said earlier, Cancer woman is extremely moody.
sentences.chinese: 正像我刚才说的，巨蟹女是极其情绪化的。

sentences.english: The Full Moon occurs right at your midheaven.
sentences.chinese: 此时满月发生在巨蟹的中天，另一半出现。

sentences.english: It is difficult for the Libra to get on well with a Cancer's changeable temperament.
sentences.chinese: 巨蟹多变的性情也让天秤感觉难以相处。

sentences.english: Cancer knits sweaters and makes fudge for the neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 巨蟹座会为邻居织毛衣或者自制巧克力。

sentences.english: Another characteristic of the Cancer woman is that she is extremely emotional and sensitive.
sentences.chinese: 巨蟹女的另一个特点是极度的感性和敏感。

sentences.english: The dual nature of Cancerians will determine their life in 2011.
sentences.chinese: 2011年，巨蟹宫的双重性将会决定蟹蟹们的命运。

sentences.english: Masterful Scorpio should make a good mate for quiet spoken Cancer.
sentences.chinese: 主任派头的天蝎会是寡言少语巨蟹的好伴侣。

sentences.english: Cancerians have a deep love for home, and they truly treasure their friends and family.
sentences.chinese: 巨蟹座的人是个恋家控，他们视朋友家人为珍宝。

sentences.english: However, when in a relationship, the Cancer woman yearns for love and attention.
sentences.chinese: 当然，在恋爱中，巨蟹女很渴望被爱和关注。

sentences.english: You will have difficulty listening to the Crab's nagging and negativity.
sentences.chinese: 白羊也难以接受巨蟹的唠叨和消极。

sentences.english: As for adorers, cancer shows the active action with positive attitude.
sentences.chinese: 对于心仪者，巨蟹表现出主动争取的姿态，相当积极。

definition: Capricorn (star sign)/northern people in classical times, a branch of the Huns or Xiongnu 匈奴
balance scale/Taiwan pr. [tian1 ping2]
Scorpio (constellation)
Pisces (star sign)
Aries (star sign)
Cancer (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Taurus (star sign)/Jinniu district of Chengdu city 成都市[Cheng2 du1 shi4], Sichuan
Gemini (star sign)
Pisces (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Scorpio or Scorpius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Libra (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Leo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Capricornus
Virgo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/popular variant of 室女座[Shi4 nu:3 zuo4]
Aquarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Sagittarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/popular variant of 人馬座|人马座[Ren2 ma3 zuo4]
